verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: serap] [V: writes] [ARG1: buhari seeks speedy trial of corrupt past governors serap called on buhari to use his good office and leadership position to direct the attorney general of the federation and minister of justice abubakar malami san to without delay take over and expeditiously prosecute grand corruption cases involving all indicted former state governors and to prosecute indicted serving governors at the expiration of their tenure as governors federation account attorney general deputy director sahara reporters serap justice abubakar malami trial un timothy adewale muhammadu buhari nigeria president muhammadu buhari united nations]

serap writes [ARG0: buhari] [V: seeks] [ARG1: speedy trial of corrupt past governors serap] called on buhari to use his good office and leadership position to direct the attorney general of the federation and minister of justice abubakar malami san to without delay take over and expeditiously prosecute grand corruption cases involving all indicted former state governors and to prosecute indicted serving governors at the expiration of their tenure as governors federation account attorney general deputy director sahara reporters serap justice abubakar malami trial un timothy adewale muhammadu buhari nigeria president muhammadu buhari united nations
